Text: Why not just present it in txt or rtf format so everyone can view it?

Well, the format it was in was all jumbled. I put it in Excel so it would keep the information in columns. Plus, you can filter and search much more easily. As for viewing it, Excel format is easily read by Google Documents if you don't have Excel. Just go to the Google search page and click on the "more" tab or go to docs.google.com.
Vast amount of really great stuff. Thanks for cataloging it for us.
Wow, really very helpful! Thanks for going the extra mile to do this file and sharing it!
Thanks for making this, it was great. Good job.
